article1.title: Article 1 – Purpose and Scope
article1.content: These General Terms and Conditions of Sale ('Terms') govern the services offered by Yobson, a coach specializing in perinatal fitness, to any person wishing to benefit from these services ('Client'). Any order implies unconditional acceptance of these Terms.

article2.title: Article 2 – Description of Services
article2.content: Yobson offers fitness programs adapted to pregnancy and postpartum, available in different packages: Monthly subscription: unlimited access to online training videos. Individual sessions: personalized coaching in-person or online. Group classes: small groups for quality support.

article3.title: Article 3 – Prices and Payment
article3.content: The prices of services are indicated in euros, all taxes included. They are available on Yobson’s official website and may be changed at any time. Payment is made online through secure methods. No service will be provided until full payment is received.

article4.title: Article 4 – Orders and Booking Terms
article4.content: Any order is considered firm and final after payment confirmation. Booking a coaching session or group class is subject to availability and confirmation by Yobson.

article5.title: Article 5 – Cancellation and Refund
article5.content: Cancellation by the Client: Any session canceled less than 24 hours before the appointment will not be refunded. Cancellation by Yobson: In case of exceptional unavailability, the Client will be notified, and a rescheduling or refund solution will be offered.

article6.title: Article 6 – Responsibilities and Commitments
article6.content: Yobson undertakes to provide services in accordance with the descriptions on its website. The Client acknowledges practicing the exercises at their own risk and agrees to consult a healthcare professional before starting a program.

article7.title: Article 7 – Intellectual Property
article7.content: All content (videos, written materials, methodology) provided by Yobson remains its exclusive property. Any reproduction, distribution, or use without permission is strictly prohibited.

article8.title: Article 8 – Data Protection
article8.content: Personal information collected is used only for service management and is never shared with third parties without consent. In accordance with data protection laws, the Client has the right to access, modify, and delete their data.

article9.title: Article 9 – Disputes and Applicable Law
article9.content: These Terms are governed by French law. In case of dispute, an amicable solution will be sought before any legal action. Otherwise, the competent courts will be those of Yobson's registered office location.

article10.title: Article 10 – Contact
article10.content: For any questions or complaints, contact Yobson via [add contact email/website].
